explanation: The membership check used a constructed set set([a,b]) compared against a list of set literals. To make the intent clear and avoid any subtle issues, I replaced set([a,b]) with the set literal {a,b}. The logic remains the same (check the unordered pair {a,b} is not one of the forbidden pairs and the absolute difference is 1 or 3), but the corrected line is clearer and idiomatic.
